item.description:
Apeiron Sustainable LIving Festival & Clean Energy Expo.

In association with the Providence Bike Coalition, Matt will be leading a Bike Train from Providence to the festival portion of the festivities. There is also a train on Saturday being led by other members of the PBC.

Those registering and arriving by bike receive a free t-shirt and admission to the festival! Train Schedule and Registration!

The festival features 80+ workshops, activities, live music... (Cool, Mark Erelli and Dar Williams!)

If you are at all interested in sustainable living, alternative living, alternative transportation (Owner of The Hub bike shop and PBC member Jack Madden will be holding a bike commuting workshop on Saturday), or just a day out in the woods with music, food and interesting arts and crafts, this is the place!
item.how_to_find_us: See Bike Train Schedule for times and locations
item.name: Apeiron Sustainable Living Festival (and optional Bike Train)
